author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Sumit Pandit "Average product rating is not calculated properly." (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3816) - OFBIZ-3816
In ProductWorker.java, method getAverageProductRating is used to calculate product's average rating. It is always return zero.

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Sumit Pandit "Average product rating is not calculated properly." (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3816) - OFBIZ-3816
In ProductWorker.java, method getAverageProductRating is used to calculate product's average rating. It is always return zero.

author: hwright
msg: Remove the 1.6.x-issue3469 branch, reintegrated in r953297.

author: hwright
msg: Fix issue #3469 "tree conflict inside of directory external causes
Assertion failures are bad and tree-conflicted externals cannot
be reverted or resolved without this fix.
This is not a backport branch. The fix is for 1.6.x only.
Trunk will need a separate fix as part of wc-ng.
